name: multi-downloader-nx
description: Downloader for Crunchyroll, Hidive, and AnimationDigitalNetwork with CLI and GUI
author: AnimeDL <AnimeDL@users.noreply.github.com>

scripts.start: pnpm prestart && cd lib && node gui.js
scripts.build-windows-x64-cli: pnpm run prebuild-cli && cd lib && node modules/build windows-x64
scripts.build-windows-arm64-cli: pnpm run prebuild-cli && cd lib && node modules/build windows-arm64
scripts.build-linux-x64-cli: pnpm run prebuild-cli && cd lib && node modules/build linuxstatic-x64
scripts.build-linux-arm64-cli: pnpm run prebuild-cli && cd lib && node modules/build linuxstatic-arm64
scripts.build-android-armv7-cli: pnpm run prebuild-cli && cd lib && node modules/build linuxstatic-armv7
scripts.build-macos-x64-cli: pnpm run prebuild-cli && cd lib && node modules/build macos-x64
scripts.build-macos-arm64-cli: pnpm run prebuild-cli && cd lib && node modules/build macos-arm64
scripts.build-alpine-x64-cli: pnpm run prebuild-cli && cd lib && node modules/build alpine-x64
scripts.build-alpine-arm64-cli: pnpm run prebuild-cli && cd lib && node modules/build alpine-arm64
scripts.build-windows-x64-gui: pnpm run prebuild-gui && cd lib && node modules/build windows-x64 true
scripts.build-windows-arm64-gui: pnpm run prebuild-gui && cd lib && node modules/build windows-arm64 true
scripts.build-linux-x64-gui: pnpm run prebuild-gui && cd lib && node modules/build linuxstatic-x64 true
scripts.build-linux-arm64-gui: pnpm run prebuild-gui && cd lib && node modules/build linuxstatic-arm64 true
scripts.build-android-armv7-gui: pnpm run prebuild-gui && cd lib && node modules/build linuxstatic-armv7 true
scripts.build-macos-x64-gui: pnpm run prebuild-gui && cd lib && node modules/build macos-x64 true
scripts.build-macos-arm64-gui: pnpm run prebuild-gui && cd lib && node modules/build macos-arm64 true
scripts.build-alpine-x64-gui: pnpm run prebuild-gui && cd lib && node modules/build alpine-x64 true
scripts.build-alpine-arm64-gui: pnpm run prebuild-gui && cd lib && node modules/build alpine-arm64 true
scripts.test-windows-x64: pnpm run pretest && cd lib && node modules/build windows-x64
scripts.test-linux-x64: pnpm run pretest && cd lib && node modules/build linuxstatic-x64 && node modules/build alpine-x64
scripts.test-macos-x64: pnpm run pretest && cd lib && node modules/build macos-x64
scripts.test-windows-arm64: pnpm run pretest && cd lib && node modules/build windows-arm64
scripts.test-linux-arm64: pnpm run pretest && cd lib && node modules/build linuxstatic-arm64 && node modules/build alpine-x64
scripts.test-macos-arm64: pnpm run pretest && cd lib && node modules/build macos-arm64
